title: File Architecture Schema
description: Consolidated schema for filetype attribution and sequential indexing principles.

filetype_attribution.name: Filetype Attribution with Filesystem Von Neumann Architecture
filetype_attribution.rule: All files must reside in folders explicitly designated for their file type. No file should be stored in a generic or unrelated folder.
filetype_attribution.purpose: Promotes a clean and organized filesystem where file types dictate their logical memory space.

sequential_indexing.name: Sequential Indexing within File Type
sequential_indexing.rule: Files are indexed sequentially based on processing order within their file_type. The index is continuous across subdirectories.
sequential_indexing.implementation: Crucial for maintaining predictable order in chronological logs or structured documentation.
